properties.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range
properties.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 4 at 2:48AM PST until February 4 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph.
Advisory level winds with gusts to 55 mph will continue after
the warning expires and continue into Wednesday morning.

* WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa
Monica Range.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM PST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as
trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will
be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The wind, in combination with low
temperatures, will result in wind chill readings between 0 to
minus 10 degrees in many areas.
properties.instruction:
People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around
trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of
your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if
you must drive.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING
